Meeting of the minds Coach Rick Stansbury right talks strategy with his assistants PERIOD

Cockfights are unpleasant dogfights can be grueling PERIOD Aesthetics were abandoned Wednesday night as the South Carolina Gamecocks   Southeastern Conference visited the Mississippi State Bulldogs   SEC PERIOD

Following the third consecutive loss for MSU the No PERIOD  Bulldogs shot  percent for the game and played a choking defense that held South Carolina to . percent from the field in a 40turnover grudge match that became a lopsided  victory PERIOD

 said MSU head coach Rick Stansbury PERIOD 

After eight minutes of play the Bulldogs had nine points and nine turnovers while the Gamecocks countered with eight points and six turnovers PERIOD The score stagnated for almost four minutes until a Timmy Bowers jumper a Winsome Frazier tipin four consecutive Mario Austin field goals and a Frazier three pointer capped a  Bulldog run PERIOD

 said Stansbury PERIOD 

 said Frazier who scored nine of his  in the first half PERIOD 

This spurt marked the first time in the game that Austin who finished with a gamehigh  points had gotten the ball with scoring opportunities PERIOD

 said the AllSEC center PERIOD

 said Stansbury PERIOD 

South Carolina failed to make a field goal in the final five minutes of the first session but capitalized on seven free throws and lingered  at intermission PERIOD

 said Derrick Zimmerman PERIOD 

Ignerski  points  boards and Bowers  points  assists nailed consecutive three pointers to widen the gap  PERIOD State also applied full court pressure early in the second half to prevent a South Carolina comeback PERIOD

 said Stansbury PERIOD 

USC outrebounded MSU  in the second session and cut the gap to  but still had difficulty finding the bottom of the net with their shots PERIOD

The Bulldogs remain in the Magnolia State and will host Louisiana State   SEC at  p.m PERIOD Saturday PERIOD The Tigers who just two weeks ago defeated the Bulldogs  are coming off backtoback losses against Mississippi  and at Arkansas  PERIOD

 said Zimmerman PERIOD
